channel.title: Npc hp help plz! look plz! medal star im talking to you!
channel.description: plz i need help on the npc hp some one told me to go to npc handler or sumthing but where in the world is it??? plz need help if its easier to get back to me you can email em at footballer_forlife17@hotmail.com

item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

You need to go into your npc.cfg which is in the source file that you downloaded. Search for the npc ID that you wish to change the hp of and change it when you find it.

where does it say that is it where it says file , console ,music player etc?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 08:45:25 AM[/size][hr]ok ok im at the folder hold im looking for all the stuff liek compile and all[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 08:47:43 AM[/size][hr]yah by the way when u say cfg. ? u mean config i clicked configs all isee is breaks defaults and uids[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 08:51:57 AM[/size][hr]ok ive set the hps now when i log on should they be there whth the hp?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 08:59:58 AM[/size][hr]ok i started of a changed the hp for a guard and saved it on word now when i log on and type the id for a guard and he appears and i att him it only shows 0 and he dies
